title: Bug 124066: Insert chart is not translated into Chinese in context menu
description: Bug 124066: In the context menu, the option to insert a chart is not translated into Chinese.
OB: When right-clicking in the layout, the context menu appears. The expected behavior is for the option to insert a chart to be translated into Chinese. However, the actual behavior is that the option remains in the source language (not translated into Chinese).
EB: The option to insert a chart in the context menu should be translated into Chinese when the software is in a Chinese environment.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a report in a Chinese environment. 2. Right-click in the layout to bring up the context menu.
